content: @Grahame Grieve Will the standard base syntax for temporary code system URIs (i.e., http://terminology.hl7.org/temporary-uri/codeSystem/) be supported by the IG publication tool? @Amol Vyas
@Grahame Grieve @Amol Vyas the temporary URIs required for the CARIN IG for Blue Button have been resolved, so there's no sense of urgency for a response. As reference, it would be helpful to know.
it will be supported soon. not quite sure how soon
